message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11,000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you.

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $11,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable paying right now.  I'm willing to offer $10,500 for the product.  This reflects its value to me and hopefully allows for a fair deal for both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $10,800. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to you.
